title.title: title
title.description: Title of the dataset. Initialized by dataset name, but not necessarily the same.

data_path.title: original data file path
data_path.description: Original file path storing raw data.

header_path.title: original header file path
header_path.description: Original file path storing header of the data (metadata). It can be the same as data_path if the header is stored along with the raw data.

authors.title: authors
authors.description: In LaTeX format, i.e., Surname1, Name1 and Surname2, Name2, and so on.

time_zone.title: time zone
time_zone.description: Supported by the python-dateutil library, the same as the system.

name.title: name of microscope
name.description: The name of the TEM, e.g., Titan3 Cubed 60-300.

beam_current.title: beam current
beam_current.description: The total current of the electron beam.

accelerate_voltage.title: accelerate voltage (U)
accelerate_voltage.description: The accelerate voltage of the electron beam.

probe_area.title: probe area
probe_area.description: The area of the scanning probe.

camera_length.title: camera length (CL)
camera_length.description: The effective camera length of the STEM.

convergence_angle.title: convergence semi-angle (α)
convergence_angle.description: Determined by the size of the convergence aperture.

magnification.title: magnification factor
magnification.description: Determined by the scanning step size of STEM.

dwell_time.title: dwell time
dwell_time.description: Time for an electron beam to stay per pixel at acquisition of a STEM image by scan.

step_size_i.title: step size (i-direction)
step_size_i.description: Recorded step size in the i direction (-y direction).

step_size_j.title: step size (j-direction)
step_size_j.description: Recorded step size in the j direction (x direction).

acquisition_time.title: acquisition time
acquisition_time.description: The time when the data is acquired.

acquisition_date.title: acquisition date
acquisition_date.description: The date when the data is acquired.

acquisition_location.title: acquisition location
acquisition_location.description: The location, institute and lab where the data is acquired.

acquisition_timezone.title: acquisition timezone
acquisition_timezone.description: The time zone where the data is acquired.

name.title: name of camera
name.description: The name of the pixelated electron camera or direct electron detector.

pixel_number_i.title: pixels (i-direction)
pixel_number_i.description: Sensor pixels in i-direction (-y direction, height).

pixel_number_j.title: pixels (j-direction)
pixel_number_j.description: Sensor pixels in j-direction (x direction, width).

pixel_size_i.title: sensor pixel size (i-direction)
pixel_size_i.description: Sensor pixel size in i-direction (-y direction, height).

pixel_size_j.title: sensor pixel size (j-direction)
pixel_size_j.description: Sensor pixel size in j-direction (x direction, width).

tilt_alpha.title: tilt angle α (X)
tilt_alpha.description: The tilt angle α/X of the specimen.

tilt_beta.title: tilt angle β (Y)
tilt_beta.description: The tilt angle β/Y of the specimen.

rotation.title: rotation angle
rotation.description: The rotational offset angle of the specimen.

x.title: stage coordinate x
x.description: The x coordinate of the specimen stage.

y.title: stage coordinate y
y.description: The y coordinate of the specimen stage.

z.title: stage coordinate z
z.description: The z coordinate (height) of the specimen stage.

du_i.title: reciprocal space pixel size (i-direction)
du_i.description: Pixel size of the diffraction (reciprocal) space in i direction (-y direction).

du_j.title: reciprocal space pixel size (j-direction)
du_j.description: Pixel size of the diffraction (reciprocal) space in j direction (x direction).

scan_dr_i.title: scanning step size (i-direction)
scan_dr_i.description: Calibrated scanning step size in i-direction (-y direction).

scan_dr_j.title: scanning step size (j-direction)
scan_dr_j.description: Calibrated scanning step size in j-direction (x direction).

dr_i.title: real space pixel size (i-direction)
dr_i.description: Real space pixel size in i-direction (-y direction). It is calculated from du_i and may not be the same as scan_dr_i.

dr_j.title: real space pixel size (j-direction)
dr_j.description: Real space pixel size in j-direction (x direction). It is calculated from du_j and may not be the same as scan_dr_j.

scan_i.title: scanning steps (i-direction)
scan_i.description: Scanning step number in i-direction (-y direction).

scan_j.title: scanning steps (j-direction)
scan_j.description: Scanning step number in j-direction (x direction).

scan_rotation.title: scanning rotational offset
scan_rotation.description: The rotation angle between scanning coordinates and camera coordinates.

alignment_pixel_i.title: translation pixel of diffraction pattern (i-direction)
alignment_pixel_i.description: Translation pixel of diffraction pattern in i-direction (-y direction) to centering the diffraction pattern.

alignment_pixel_j.title: translation pixel of diffraction pattern (j-direction)
alignment_pixel_j.description: Translation pixel of diffraction pattern in j-direction (x direction) to centering the diffraction pattern.

shift_mapping_path.title: path of alignment translation vectors
shift_mapping_path.description: Record the path of the vector field that records the center of the diffraction pattern should be moved at each scanning point.

C3.title: spherical aberration (C3) angle
C3.description: Spherical aberration (C3) angle. (Useless due to symmetry)

C5.title: spherical aberration (C5) angle
C5.description: Spherical aberration (C5) angle. (Useless due to symmetry)

display_vmin.title: minimum displaying value
display_vmin.description: Minimum displaying value of the diffraction patterns.

display_vmax.title: maximum displaying value
display_vmax.description: Maximum displaying value of the diffraction patterns.

display_colormap.title: displaying colormap
display_colormap.description: The display colormap of diffraction patterns, e.g., viridis.

scanning_angle.title: rotational correction value
scanning_angle.description: The value used to estimate probe positions on the object function during the scan.

object_update.title: object update factor
object_update.description: The parameter that controls the rate of update of the object function during the ptychographic reconstruction.

probe_update.title: probe update factor
probe_update.description: The parameter that controls the rate of update of the probe function during the ptychographic reconstruction.

iterations.title: iterations
iterations.description: The number of iterations for the ptychographic reconstruction.
